title: Interview with Aurora González Vidal, SCIE Research Award - BBVA Foundation 2022
description: Aurora González Vidal, has been awarded in 2022 with one of the Scientific Computer Science Society of Spain (SCIE) - BBVA Foundation Research Awards in the Young Computer Researchers category.

title: NGI Explorers First Expedition: meet the Explorers | Aurora González-Vidal
description: ‘Meet the Explorers’ is a new set of video interviews featuring innovators and researchers from all over Europe sharing their inspirations as they prepare for their expeditions to the USA through NGI Explorers.

title: Solving problems for a better future
description: On the occasion of the celebration of European Day, the Seneca Foundation launches the video “Solving problems for a better future” that includes the testimony of five of the 33 young people hired, thanks to 91.89% co-financing by the Social Fund European through the Youth Employment Operational Program and the Youth Employment Initiative (POEJ).
